et: Caspar {it}Milquetoast{/it}, comic strip character created by H. T. Webster †1952 American cartoonist
shortdef: a timid, meek, or unassertive person

dt.t: Do we really want a someone who is a {wi}milquetoast{/wi} halfhearted candidate or someone who will defend the Constitution with every fiber of her being?
… after declining multiple opportunities to comment during the reporting of the story, he finally produced a most {wi}milquetoast{/wi} statement Friday.

shortdef: lacking in character or vigor : wishy-washy
